title: The post game stats takes super long to load, 3 min at least
body: But I don't want to have the client open while i'm in the game because It plays the champ select music

replies.body: If you have "close client during game" turned on then the after match lobby is going to take a bit to open back up since it's been closed out entirely. If you turn it off, then you should be able see that lobby quicker. You mentioned not wanting to turn that option off, but in this case that's going to be the only way to see that lobby sooner.
hey I've noticed you copy paste this answer everywhere but don't respond to people who responded to your answer, so just to reiterate, this problem only started appearing since the latest patch

I typically respond to the person who originally created the post to begin with, as I want to focus on the person who presented their problem to me. I'd love to help everyone, but if I focused on replying to every single reply like this, a lot of other posts would go unnoticed. The best way to get our attention is to simply make your own post.

That response might seem a bit copy/pasted, but it's simply because the answer is the same for this issue across the board.

Also, this latest patch forced that option to turn on for some people I'm noticing. If you have that option on and the after match lobby takes awhile to load, it's because "close client during game" forces the client to close so then you have to wait for it to fully load back up. If that option is disabled, the client will never close and would pop back up much faster. If turning that off doesn't present any changes, then obviously the problem is elsewhere, but we would have never known that without trying something first.
